contents:
MicrosoftDudes was created by the people below. Together we have one passion and that is Microsoft.
   Jeroen Burgerhout Engin Soyal Richard Ferreira          Microsoft365 Consultant & Microsoft Certified Trainer IT Consultant IT Consultant   Jeroen has been in the IT profession since 2001 and has always had a preference for Microsoft products.
In recent years, the focus has been on the Modern Workplace, in conjunction with Intune, Microsoft365, Azure AD, Windows 10/11.
title: About us
